content.text:
# List of Albanians in the United Kingdom

This is a list of notable British people of Albanian descent.
Notable people
Academia
* Lea Ypi – political theorist
Business
* Daniel Nikolla - Business person
Journalism
* Adel Darwish – British political journalist, veteran Fleet Street reporter, author, historian
* Ilir Kadia – journalist
* Klentiana Mahmutaj – author and academic
* Laura Woods - TV presenter, reporter and journalist
Arts and entertainment

* Lala Meredith-Vula – artist and photographer
Cinema
* Orli Shuka – British-Albanian actor
